$ cat projects.txt

  • Firebase Recycler View - FirebaseRecyclerView with List(DatabaseRefefence) support in Kotlin(could be used seamlessly with Java as well)

  • Androidonism Webpage - Blogging site made with google-polymer
  • Firebase Database Manager - This is android app, which can be used to manage firebase real time databases.
  • Rainbow Shots - This is android Game
  • Userful Scripts - This repository is compilation of useful shell script mostly by me

$ cat tools.txt
